contest-event.event-date:
July 20, 1891 D Bridlington Contest
Bridlington Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
bridlington-contest
Recreation Ground, Bridlington Quay Prizes: £25, £18, £10, £5 Quickstep: 1. Leeds Forge, 2. Batley. 4 bands competed
Feb. 7, 2013, 6:18 p.m. Nov. 17, 2017, 10:46 p.m.
1 Leeds Forge Alexander Owen Faust [Gounod, unknown arranger]
2 Batley Old Benjamin Denton Jackson Grand Selection: Mendelssohn's Works [arr. Godfrey]
3 Wyke Edwin Swift L'Etoile du Nord [arr. Godfrey]
4 Lindley Band Edwin Swift Meyerbeer [unknown arranger]
